item.title: Aldra add a quote by Emma Goldman
item.description: "Every daring attempt to make a great change in existing conditions, every lofty vision of new possibilities for the human race, has been labeled Utopian." -- Emma Goldman

item.title: Aldra add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Aldra add a quote by mary anne radmacher
item.description: "I am not the same having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world." -- mary anne radmacher

item.title: Aldra add a quote by mary anne radmacher
item.description: "it is (often) the quiet gesture which carries the most significance - the one which suddenly directs the symphony." -- mary anne radmacher

item.title: Aldra add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "But the effect of her being on those around her was incalculably diffusive: for the growing good of the world is partly dependent on unhistoric acts; and that things are not so ill with you and me as they might have been, is half owing to the number who lived faithfully a hidden life, and rest in unvisited tombs." -- George Eliot

item.title: Aldra add a quote by Utah Phillips
item.description: "Time is an enormous, long river, and I’m standing in it, just as you’re standing in it. My elders are the tributaries, and everything they thought and every struggle they went through and everything they gave their lives to, and every song they created, and every poem that they laid down flows down to me – and if I take the time to ask, and if I take the time to see, and if I take the time to reach out, I can build that bridge between my world and theirs. I can reach down into that river and take out what I need to get through this world" -- Utah Phillips

item.title: Aldra add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Forgiveness is giving up all hope of having had a better past." -- Anne Lamott
